datafield.subfield: River basin management in the twenty-first century :

editors: Victor R. Squires, Visiting Professor, College of Grassland Science, Gansu Agricultural University, Lanzhou, China and International Consultant, Adelaide, Australia, Hugh M. Milner, Water Management Consultant, Northbridge, NSW, Australia, Katherine A. Daniell, Research School of Social Sciences and Crawford School of Public Policy, The Australian National University, Canberra, ACT, Australia.

The hegemony of integrated water resources management as a global water discourse -- Beyond IWRM : developing territorial intelligence at the local scales -- Addressing implementation deficits related to IWRM in Canada -- Integrated watershed management of water and other natural resources in river basins of the United States -- Integrated water resources management of inland river basins in the Hexi Corridor, Gansu, China with special reference to the Shule River Basin -- The critical role of local farmers in IWRM in Ghaghra-Gomti Basin, India -- Managing transboundary river basins -- The privatization initiatives in the Turkish water sector : reflections on the transboundary water politics in the Euphrates-Tigris River Basin -- Challenges for management of the Orange/Senqu River Basin -- Political economy versus comparative advantage in the Nile basin : short term advantages or long term gain? -- Sustainable management of water resources in the Yellow River Basin : main issues and legal approaches -- People versus place in Australia’s Murray-Darling Basin : balancing economic, social ecosystem and community outcomes -- The role of water users associations in integrated water resource management of Zhangye City in Heihe River Basin, China -- Republic of Tajikistan : its role in the management of water resources in the Aral Sea Basin -- Lake Eyre Basin : challenges for managing the world’s most variable river system -- People and place as determinants of success or failure to meet management objectives in river basins -- From policy to practice : institutional arrangements for integrated river basin management in Nepal -- Sink or swim : alternative approaches to flood disaster reconstruction and mitigation -- The role of territorial intelligence : the case of the Thau Territory, Southern France -- Uniting perspectives : people and place in river basin management.
Access restricted to authorized users and institutions.
